mean_cn: adj.效率低的，无能的，不称职的
mean_en: not doing a job well and not making the best use of time, money, energy, etc.
sentence: I should fire this inefficient guy who keeps producing just one pair of shoes a day.
sentence_trans: 我应该开除这个一天只生产一双皮鞋的低效率的家伙。
word_etyma: in否定+ef出+fici做+ent...的→不能做出事来→inefficient没有效率的
